name: Ezeelive Web Solutions
tag_list: php-developer-mumbai-india, web-design-development-india, magento, prestashop, cakephp, yii, zend
overview:
Ezeelive is a web designer and development company from Mumbai, India providing services for a number of varied domains like hospitality, industrial, corporate, professionals like fashion designers, musicians, interior designers… and just about anyone who wants to make their presence felt on the web. Whether you are located in Mumbai or anywhere in India or abroad, we will provide the best designing and development services for your requirements. From conceptualization to the final execution of your designer web site, we work with you so that you have the best designer website amongst your competitors. As a professional web designer company from Mumbai,India we see to it that you get the best designer services for all your web designing requirements.

We are offering all types website design and development specially in Php eg. Ecommerce Module (Magento, Prestashop, Zen-Cart, Oscommerce), Open Source System (Drupal, Joomla, Mamboo, CMS Builder), Php Framework (Zend, Cakephp, Symphony, Yii), Caching System (Zend Cache Module, APC, Memcahe). Visit http://www.ezeelive.com for more detail..
